channel.title: Newsservers
channel.description:
Can someone explain them, or give me links to somewhere I can read more about them? I was reading on this thread http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,318041.0.html
about them, and they sound interesting.
Thanks.

item.title: Newsservers
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

You probably mean me, I posted in that thread that I downloaded via newsservers. It’s also known as usenet. It’s available in every country, but not all ISP’s have their own newsservers. I’m lucky, my ISP allows me to download at the maximum speed I pay for, without an extra payment.

Look up this wikipedia article, as it explains everything you need to know: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Usenet

Read full topic
